message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on a high-quality item that will greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the value of the product, $12,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to offer $9,500 for it. This reflects the value I see in the product and would be a fair price for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep, but I'm still confident in the value of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,000. This is a compromise that I think will benefit both of us.
